title: Entity Condition
description:
Entity Condition Types operate on an Entity, which also allows access to the world.
These are available to be used in most powers in the condition object field (or entity_condition in other power/condition types), which restricts when a power is active.
Type: 'origins:in_block_anywhere'
- Checks how many blocks are overlapping with the entity's eyes or feet.

block_condition.description: The block condition type which blocks need to fulfill in order to count for this condition.

comparison.description: How the number of blocks which overlap and fulfill block_condition should be compared to the specified value.

compare_to.description: The value to compare the number to.
